content:
# I have successfully moved to the nearest stone resource patch. 
# Now, I will harvest some stone to gather the necessary materials for crafting a Stone Furnace.

# Step 5: Harvest stone from the resource patch
harvest_resource(position=stone_position, quantity=20)  # Harvest 20 stone from the patch.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after harvesting stone.
